# kCFUserNotificationUseRadioButtonsFlag

**Global Variable**

Creates a group of radio buttons instead of checkboxes for the elements in the [doc://com.apple.corefoundation/documentation/CoreFoundation/kCFUserNotificationCheckBoxTitlesKey] array in the user notification’s description dictionary.

## Declaration

```swift
var kCFUserNotificationUseRadioButtonsFlag: CFOptionFlags { get }
```

## Constants

- **kCFUserNotificationNoDefaultButtonFlag**: Displays the dialog without the default, alternate, or other buttons.

items.description: Displays the dialog without the default, alternate, or other buttons.
items.name: kCFUserNotificationNoDefaultButtonFlag

title: kCFUserNotificationUseRadioButtonsFlag
